title: LetterPerfect
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224631/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224631/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : LetterPerfect**

Since 1986, LetterPerfect has been supplying carefully-crafted, original display fonts by [Garrett Boge](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224631/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Garrett%20Boge) and [Paul Shaw](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224631/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Shaw).

**External Links**  
 [Official Site](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224631/http:/letterspace.com/)  
 [LetterPerfect at FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224631/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/letterperfect/)
author: Stephen Coles
